ReferenceDocuments.name: SUREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (or example, subject refused, etc.) or entered as free text. When PRREASND is used, the SDTMIG variable PRSTAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset.
